psi_research <vilhellm@...> wrote:                               In the folder with the same name as this email I posted a pic of a
 looped video image with what some consider to be electronically
 enabled spirit manifestation. The method of pointing a camera a tv
 screen and feeding the output of the camera to the input jack goes
 back 30 years. researchers have sometimes claimed they clearly
 recognize who the people are staring back. I don't know who the person
 is in this image, perhaps  my future self...?
